post.summary: Route to register an user to the system.

200.description:
If normal user then response will be: 
                        {
                          "statusCode": 200,
                          "message": "Registered successfully.",
                          "type": "Default",
                          "data":  {
                            "_id": "string",
                            "name": "string",
                            "email": "string",
                            "password": "string",
                            "createdAt": "string",
                            "updatedAt": "string",
                            "__v": 0
                          }
                        }

get.summary: Route to get an user from the system.

delete.summary: Route to remove an user from the system.

put.summary: Route to update an user to the system.
